content: Charging adapter CA-B12 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for batteries, chargers and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Allows any B12 batteries to be charged on C 4/36 family Hilti chargers Applications Compatible with all B12 batteries To be used with C 4/36 family Hilti chargers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Charger compatibility: C 4/36-90, C 4/36-350, C4/36-DC, C 4/36-MC4, C 4/36, RC 4/36, RC 4/36-DAB Dimensions (LxWxH): 5.3 x 3.7 x 2.1 in Weight: 0.4 lb.
